src:
Dirilis, Segini Harga Suksesor Redmi Note 8
07 Nov 2019, 04:52 by Mansur
Harga Redmi Note 8T 
Oketekno – Setelah beberapa lama bocoran tentang suksesor dari Redmi Note 8 ini tersebar luas, kemarin Xiaomi telah meluncurkannya juga. Akan tetapi untuk kehadirannya bukan di pasar Asia, melainkan Redmi Note 8T ini ditujukan untuk pasar Smartphone Eropa. Dengan penawaran harga sedikit lebih tinggi, spesifikasi yang tertanam juga sedikit lebih meningkat.
Hal paling menarik yang bisa ditemukan pada Redmi Note 8T ini yaitu memiliki fitur NFC yang sebelumnya cuman hadir di Note 8 Pro. Melalui fitur ini, nantinya pengguna dapat melakukan transaksi pembayaran dengan mudah dan cepat, dimana saja, kapan saja. Tentu, fitur ini sekarang menjadi salah satu yang paling bermanfaat, karena sebagian besar toko terutama di Negara maju seperti Eropa sudah berbasis digital kebanyakan.

Ketahui Yuk: 

Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Vivo Z1 Pro, Duel Sengit Smartphone Murah di Indonesia


Kemudian untuk charger pengisian daya cepat 18W yang mendukung Redmi Note 8T ini dihadirkan bersamaan unit ponsel. Dimana strategi ini cukup berbeda daripada Redmi Note 8 yang lebih memilih untuk menjual charger cepat 18W itu secara terpisah. Selain dukungan teknologi pengisian yang sama, kapasitasnya pun juga sama yakni 4.000 mAh.


Copyright ©GSMArena

Di bagian kamera, Redmi Note 8T punya 4 kamera belakang dengan resolusi yang sama seperti model reguler, yakni 48MP + 8MP Ultra Wide + 2MP Macro Lens + 2MP Depth Sensor. Sedangkan untuk kamera selfie yang tertanamkan memiliki resolusi 13MP, yang mana masih tersematkan pada bagian notch mungil di atas layarnya yang memiliki luas 6.3 inci.
Soal performa, suksesor Redmi Note 8 ini telah dipacu oleh chipset Snapdragon 665 dan didukung oleh memori internal RAM hingga 4GB serta kapasitas penyimpanan hingga 128GB. Sistem operasi yang dijalankan yaitu Android Pie berlapis MIUI 10, dan dipastikan mendapatkan pembaruan ke sistem yang lebih baru di masa mendatang.
Harga Redmi Note 8T sedikit lebih mahal ketimbang Redmi Note 8 di Indonesia. Selain spek dan paket penjualan yang sedikit beda, harga tinggi di sana juga disebabkan oleh pajak. Harga jualnya yakni 179 Euro atau sekitar Rp 2.7 juta untuk model 3GB/32GB, dan 249 Euro atau sekitar Rp 3.8 juta untuk varian 4GB/128GB. Dan masalah kedatangannya di Indonesia, kemungkinannya kecil, sebab sudah ada 2 saudaranya yang sukses besar.
baca juga: Respon Xiaomi Indonesia Soal Redmi Note 8 Pro yang Masih Sulit Didapatkan
text:
Released, Segini Price for Successor Redmi Note 8
Nov 7 2019, 04:52 by Mansur
Price of Redmi Note 8T
Oketekno - After a while the leak about the successor of the Redmi Note 8 is widespread, yesterday Xiaomi has launched it too. However, for its presence not in the Asian market, but the Redmi Note 8T is intended for the European Smartphone market. By offering a slightly higher price, the embedded specifications are also slightly improved.
The most interesting thing that can be found on this Redmi Note 8T is that it has an NFC feature that was previously only present in Note 8 Pro. Through this feature, users will be able to make payment transactions easily and quickly, anywhere, anytime. Of course, this feature is now one of the most useful, because most stores especially in developed countries like Europe are already mostly digital based.

Let's Know:

Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Vivo Z1 Pro, Cheap Smartphone Fierce Duel in Indonesia


Then for the 18W fast charging charger that supports the Redmi Note 8T is presented along with the mobile unit. Where this strategy is quite different than the Redmi Note 8 which prefers to sell the 18W fast charger separately. In addition to the support of the same charging technology, the capacity is also the same, namely 4000 mAh.


Copyright © GSMArena

On the camera, the Redmi Note 8T has 4 rear cameras with the same resolution as the regular model, which is 48MP + 8MP Ultra Wide + 2MP Macro Lens + 2MP Depth Sensor. As for the embedded selfie camera, it has a 13MP resolution, which is still pinned to the tiny notch above the screen which has a width of 6.3 inches.
Concerning performance, the successor to the Redmi Note 8 has been driven by the Snapdragon 665 chipset and is supported by up to 4GB of internal RAM memory and storage capacity of up to 128GB. The operating system that runs is Android Pie with MIUI 10, and certainly gets an update to a newer system in the future.
The price of the Redmi Note 8T is slightly more expensive than the Redmi Note 8 in Indonesia. In addition to slightly different specs and sales packages, high prices there are also caused by taxes. The selling price is 179 Euros or around Rp 2.7 million for the 3GB / 32GB model, and 249 Euros or around Rp 3.8 million for the 4GB / 128GB variant. And the problem of his arrival in Indonesia, the possibility is small, because there are already 2 brothers who have great success.
Also read: Xiaomi Indonesia's Response Regarding the Redmi Note 8 Pro, which is Still Difficult to Obtain
